|30|Run DB2 relative path|run DB2|SQL|connection=SIEBIDQ  |sqlfile=../sql/unittestdb2job_relative.sql|expectedresult=OK             |OnError=CONTINUE|Wait=No|JobMustWaitOnStepCompletion=Yes|
|40     |Copy KVK_RESULTS  |Run IDQ           |mapping        |project=OBA_4_Mappings|application=Appl_DPL_OBA_IIDQ5317                     |mapping=dqm_TransferDeliveryInfoDynamic|ps=ps_KVK_RESULTS|result=OK|Wait=No|JobMustWaitOnStepCompletion=Yes|
